title: Hunter

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Hunter’s Mark (Day): Choose a player to give them a Hunter’s Mark.
- Prey (Night): Choose a player. If they visit a player with a Hunter’s Mark, you will deal a Powerful Attack to whoever they visit. If they do not visit anyone and they have a Hunter's Mark, you will attack them instead.
- Aim and Fire (Night, 1 use): Choose a player with a Hunter’s Mark to deal a Powerful Astral attack to them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You will be informed of all players with a Hunter's Mark at the beginning of each night.

desc:
Post 1100
*The art of hunting requires a steady aim and a quiet tongue.*
